name: Atlantic Edge
description: Atlantic Edge is a strategic VR brawler for HTC VIVE in which you play a mech pilot tasked with defending a city from an endless onslaught of kaiju. Will you save the city? Or cause as much damage as the kaiju?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7
